Description: One corner of a goat hair cloth, probably once a bag. Plain selvedge at one side; looped fringe along bottom. Warp-faced weave, colour of hair, the warp changing in stripes from selvedge in.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), B60 room 260 lower soft fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
